Normalization

Contents

  • perform_graph_native_normalization()

Normalization#

normalize.perform_graph_native_normalization(driver, database, provided_dependencies, dep_filter='all')#

Performs graph native normalization under consideration of the provided parameters.

Parameters:

  • driver¶ (neo4j.Driver) – The connection to the graph database

  • database¶ – The name of the database in which the to be normalized graph is contained

  • provided_dependencies¶ – The dependencies to be considered for the normalization

  • dep_filter¶ – Whether only a subset of dependencies should be used. Possible values: "intra-node", "intra-go", "inter-go", "all". Defaults to "all".

Type:

str

Type:

gnfd.DependencySet

Type:

str

Returns:

Return type:

(<class ‘gnfd.DependencySet’>, list[tuple[str, int]])
